column3: What is the goal here? Have a nice table in the console or in a markdown renderer?
It looks nice in a console window but also in a markdown renderer. The current file looks very crowded
You can remove the left and right borders.

@emilengler please squash.

I guess you need to fix the trailing whitespaces...\notherwise this looks good.
